13.content:
To say the school wanted you dead was an understatement.

Ever since you were brought to that decrepit old mansion with the withering masonry and the infundibuliform spires as a mere orphan child they’d conducted experiment after experiment, hoping to either finish you off or break down your spirit so death would seem more desirable. That damned school where the halls howled with the cries of murdered children was the only home you’d ever nonetheless, providing you with food, education and shelter in between sessions of electrotherapy and the prodding and the poking that came afterwards.

You were of a rare batch that’d survived the experiments. Battered, bruised and filled with immeasurable seeds of rage and resent but alive still. Many years had passed with only five of you surviving into your teenage years. Who were you exactly? You’d no idea who you’d been before the facility but now you were:

Dean: eighteen years of age, dependable and trustworthy yet hopelessly bland, de facto leader . Levelheaded but can quickly snap if he feels he or one of his ‘brothers’ is threatened. Not thick by any means but exceedingly naive and easy to manipulate. Reasonably tall and beefy like a rugby player, with a crooked nose and trimmed hair.

Edward: seventeen years of age, headstrong, cocky with a quick wit and even quicker tongue. Too smart for his own good and as a result permanently bored and eager for some misadventures. A wily snake, one can never tell what he’s thinking behind those black ghoulish eyes and cunning grin.

Andrew: eighteen years of age, uncontrollable, unpredictable and batsh*t crazy. A thrill seeker to the core, Andrew has little qualms for possible consequences and chooses to live everyday as if it were his last (side effect of seeing so many around him perish day-to-day). Lanky and spider-like in mannerisms and appearance with crazy brown hair.

Daniel: seventeen years of age, analytical and academic. Though he is easily Edward’s equal, or even superior, he has little ambition for power or excitement, focusing rather on maintaining his extensive literary collection. Not much to look at, slightly podgy with circular wire-frames and slicked back hair.

Steven: sixteen years of age, jittery, feeble, timid. Steven is the youngest and most vulnerable of the five teens. The experiments have left with him with little hope for the future and terrified to his very core. Also know for his distinctive nervous tick, exacerbated in tense moments.

To say the school wanted you dead was an understatement.

Ever since you were brought to that decrepit old mansion with the withering masonry and the infundibuliform spires as a mere orphan child they’d conducted experiment after experiment, hoping to either finish you off or break down your spirit so death would seem more desirable. That damned school where the halls howled with the cries of murdered children was the only home you’d ever nonetheless, providing you with food, education and shelter in between sessions of electrotherapy and the prodding and the poking that came afterwards.

You were of a rare batch that’d survived the experiments. Battered, bruised and filled with immeasurable seeds of rage and resent but alive still. Many years had passed with only four of you surviving into your teenage years. Who were you exactly? You’d no idea who you’d been before the facility but now you were:

Gene: eighteen years old, headstrong with a short fuse and little hesitancy to act on it. She’s nonetheless looked up to by all the other girls and has an alarming amount of tolerance to pain. Dark-skinned with curly Afro hair and built like a woman many years her senior.

Hannah: seventeen years old, intelligent but with a sardonic sense of humour and elitist attitude that makes it hard to appreciate her intellect at times. Very cold and manipulating with more vulnerable specimen but can play nice with those she considers equals. Conservative appearance, straightened red hair with cute freckles & smart glasses.

Olivia: sixteen years old, humorous, upbeat and peppy, much to the behest of her adopted ‘sisters’. Works hard to lift the spirits of the girls around her, often making herself the butt of jokes in order to cheer the others up (leading to some serious feelings of repressed anxiety under the surface). Average looks apart from the fact she’s slightly rounded.

Samantha: eighteen years old, both lustful and lithe, this nymphomaniac neither cares for the person nor their exterior, just as long as certain ‘needs’ are met. Possibly a side effect of the mental tampering. Not exceedingly pretty but sexual mannerisms, tones and a killer lower body make her a very popular person on campus indeed.
